conversation.text:
Based on your preference cues, I would recommend the movie "Holes" (1998) to you.

The movie tells the story of Danny, a young man who comes running out of a dark alley, leaving behind another young man with his neck stabbed. 

Ten years later, after numerous legal proceedings and new disclosures made during that time have slowly crumbled his faith in gaining justice, along with the pain of his loss, he realizes that only he can find the truth of what happened that night.

His journey in search of the truth reveals his complex identity for the first time: a spy who worked for the security services, an Arab who converted and became a practicing Jew, a man who felt pride, respect and sympathy for a country that has absurdly and horrifyingly betrayed him.
